price: មិនដូច្នោះទេ. ការពិតបញ្ជីរបស់ពួកប្រព្រឹត្ដអំពើអាក្រក់ គឺស្ថិតក្នុងស៊ិជ្ជីន។
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
